name: One-Card Draw
description: For quick guidance on a single question or daily insight.

positions.1: The card represents the energy or advice for the day or specific question.

name: Three-Card Spread
description: A simple spread for quick guidance, focusing on past, present, and future.

positions.1: Past: Events or influences from the past.
positions.2: Present: The current state of the situation.
positions.3: Future: The likely outcome or advice moving forward.

name: Relationship Spread
description: A spread designed to explore dynamics in romantic, platonic, or familial relationships.

positions.1: Querent: How the querent views the relationship.
positions.2: Partner: How the other person views the relationship.
positions.3: Strengths: Positive aspects of the relationship.
positions.4: Weaknesses: Challenges or areas needing work.
positions.5: Past: History or events shaping the relationship.
positions.6: Present: Current state of the relationship.

name: Celtic Cross Spread
description: A detailed spread for exploring complex questions or life situations.

positions.1: The Present: The current state or situation.
positions.2: The Challenge: The obstacle or issue to overcome.
positions.3: The Past: Past influences affecting the situation.
positions.4: The Future: Near future events or influences.
positions.5: Above: The querent’s conscious focus or goal.
positions.6: Below: Subconscious influences or deeper feelings.
positions.8: External Influences: Environment or other people’s actions.
positions.9: Hopes and Fears: The querent’s aspirations or fears.
positions.10: Outcome: The likely result if current energies continue.

name: Past Life Spread
description: Exploring past life influences on the current life.

positions.1: Past Life Theme: The core theme of the past life.
positions.2: Past Challenges: Difficulties or obstacles faced in the past life.
positions.3: Past Life Relationships: Key relationships influencing the current life.
positions.4: Karmic Debt: Lessons brought forward into this life.
positions.5: Current Challenges: How the past life influences today’s struggles.
positions.6: Resolution: How to resolve past-life influences.
